title: Can I transfer stockholdings to another Philippine stock brokerage firm in GStocks PH
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I update my account information in my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31218818513305-How-can-I-update-my-account-information-in-my-GStocks-PH-account)
- [Are there dividend stocks available in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31218842595353-Are-there-dividend-stocks-available-in-GStocks-PH)
- [What are the applicable cash or property dividend taxes in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31219798745625-What-are-the-applicable-cash-or-property-dividend-taxes-in-GStocks-PH)
- [Can I transfer stockholdings to another Philippine stock brokerage firm in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31225286057369-Can-I-transfer-stockholdings-to-another-Philippine-stock-brokerage-firm-in-GStocks-PH)
- [How can I close my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31259171664537-How-can-I-close-my-GStocks-PH-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

You can transfer stockholdings to another Philippine stock brokerage firm in GStocks PH by doing the following:

1. Fill up the [Letter to Transfer from Broker to Broker](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fNDxhE1racXZMbcyXowfu_LC-r6yx3HW/view) form with your instructions to transfer your existing stockholdings to ABCSI
2. Email the request with the attached letter to transfer to gcashcs@ABCapital.com.ph

Make sure to inform ABCSI by providing them with a copy of the transfer. They will coordinate the transfer of your stock holdings with your current stockbroker.

If your stock holdings are in a "street name" (e.g., lodged with the Philippine Depository and Trust Corporation or PDTC), the transfer will be processed electronically.
